author: g11tech
content:
Ok so here are the images ðŸ˜… , `g11tech/ethereumjs:devnet6-32aaac`  and `g11tech/lodestar:devnet6-56f86a`

Both use the latest trusted setup from :https://github.com/ethereum/c-kzg-4844/blob/main/src/trusted_setup.txt, however you may configure their trusted setup with a txt file input arg: `--trustedSetup <file path>` for ethereumjs and `--chain.trustedSetup <file path>` for lodestar
